text: usane kaha, "isane apanee dumbiyon ke saath teree dumbee ko mila lene kee maang karake nishchay hee tujhapar zulm kiya hai. aur nissandeh bahut-se saath milakar rahanevaale ek-doosare par zyaadatee karate hai, sivaay un logon ke jo eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie. kintu aise log thode hee hai." ab daood samajh gaya ki yah to hamane use pareeksha mein daala hai. atah usane apane rab se kshama-yaachana kee aur jhukakar (seedhe sajade mein) gir pada aur rujoo hua
